name: Hatventure
description:
"You are a hero with a neat hat - and the Kingdom of Hats needs you to restore peace by finding three lost hats."

A tiny game project during wich I learned some coding basics in LUA! As I am an artist, the  game mechanics are not very fleshed out as I mostly fixated on the pixelart - but I still hope you enjoy it!

Use WASD to navigate and bump into signs, people etc. to talk with them.
